about_the_game:
Discover Outpost One, Perimeter X and Learis Prime with all new enemies and unlockable Wings!

Start your Expedition, explore new colonizable planets and face a new threat. Fight through 9 new extra-long Missions and 10+ new Enemy types and unlock 3 new prototype Wings. The Expeditions thread and reward level can be adjusted from core level 10-60 in 10 difficulties, easy, nomal, hard and legendary modes. New in Steel Rain Expeditions are multiple areas per Stages, Hyperjumps, Random Encounters, Cave Stages and more. Create, download and share new Steel Rain Expeditions content with everyone!

Steel Rain is required to play the Steel Rain Expeditions DLC. The Expeditions module will be unlocked at Core Level 10 with variable content difficulty scaling up to Core Level 60.

The Expeditions thread and reward level can be adjusted from core level 10-60 in 10 difficulties, easy, nomal, hard and legendary modes. New in Steel Rain Expeditions are multiple areas per Stages, Hyperjumps, Random Encounters, Cave Stages and more. Create, download and share new Steel Rain Expeditions content with everyone!

Steel Rain is required to play the Steel Rain Expeditions DLC. The Expeditions module will be unlocked at Core Level 10 with variable content difficulty scaling up to Core Level 60.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.0 GHz +
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Min. resolution 1280 x 720
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce or Radeon Gen. 6+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 MB available space

name: Steel Rain - Expeditions

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or above
  • Processor: Intel Core i or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0b
  • Storage: 128 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce or Radeon Gen. 6+
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Joystick

short_description: Start your Expeditions to Oupost One, Perimeter X and Learis Prime! Discover a new colonizable planets and face a new threat. Fight through 9 new extra long Missions and 10+ new Enemy types with 3 new unlockable Prototype Wings.
